text: Stella Yvette Herrell (born March 16, 1964) is an American politician, businesswoman, and real estate agent. She was the U.S. Representative for New Mexico's 2nd congressional district from 2021 to 2023. She is a member of the Republican Party. She was a member of the New Mexico House of Representatives for District 51 from January 18, 2011 until January 15, 2019. She lost her re- election to the U.S. House in 2022 to Gabe Vasquez. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from New Mexico Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:State legislators of the United States
title: Yvette Herrell
